name: The Nuclear Nightmare
description:
This is Nuclear Nightmare, my entry for the Ludum Dare #49 competition.

HOW TO PLAY

Hold Space Key to charge, and release to launch your nuclear rocket towards the mouse cursor.

Try to always land on your feet (the base of your rocket), you need to be cautious in order to... not explode.

Your goal is to go as far right as possible without exploding. Good luck!
